title: Onboard labeler workflow
body:
### Context
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/11662
https://github.com/dotnet/aspire/pull/7964 
We have a new implementation of [dotnet/issue-labeler](https://github.com/dotnet/issue-labeler?rgh-link-date=2025-03-08T03%3A58%3A15Z) available that is implemented entirely using GitHub workflows. This approach allows for self-service onboarding and re-training of the prediction models. 

### Changes Made
add workflows for labeling according to [Onboarding](https://github.com/dotnet/issue-labeler/wiki/Onboarding#) instructions

### Testing
tbd in fork
rate limited :/
